column5: Staff decorate the room for our bday celebration~ also housekeeping crew is fast to change away the dirty bedsheet upon check-in and feedback~

The second times I am here with my wife. Just loving W... The food is nice. The room is cozy and beautiful. The ambience which I and my wife loving it. The place to relax and enjoy (away from home and work).

column4: Wonderful Room (King Bed) · 2 Adult(s), 1 child(ren) · 1 Nights
column5: location is a bit off from everything but overall hotel is good. had an early bday celebration and very nice of hotel to arrange balloons and cake.

column4: Wonderful Room, Room, 2 Double Beds · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: Wonderful experience and time! Especially the spa was so nice, and the front staffs are very friendly! I love the hotel bathrobe, it’s smooth and nice touch! Almost buying it, but it’s a bit expensive for me and I don’t have the one??. I will consider buying it.

column4: Fabulous Room, Room, 1 King Bed, Balcony, Pool View · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: amazing stay.. love d away spa's facilities, so totally relaxing.. love d 24hr pool.. n d views overlooking d pool n marina are so totally awesome..

column4: Spectacular Room, Room, 1 King Bed, Harbor View · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: Best place for a staycation here! The pool is great and breakfast is delicious! View is fabulous too!
Overall, enjoyed the getaway stay. breakfast was good, staff are friendly.
Great hotel to stay and enjoyed the facilities! :)

Excellent service!!! Rejuvenating staycation! Booked a staycation for an anniversary celebration with my wife. Hotel was so thoughtful to arrange a balloon with cake for us in the room. Excellent service provided by the staff and the whole vibe of the hotel does make one feel like they are on a getaway trip, even though still in Singapore. Upon check out, the staff saw us carrying a few bags and pass us a huge paper bag to fit all our bags in one big carrier. Very attentive team! Definitely coming back in the near future!
Amazing and good service. Front desk staff were very efficient and there was not much waiting time. Clean accommodation with very good sound system.
Staffs were friendly and the room were nicely decorated. Had a great view in the room. Only thing is we hope that the mini bar could be free since we took the suite room.

The room was very clean and had a very artistic vibe. Hotel staff even made a call to the room to check on us, making sure that everything was okay. The best thing of all is, the swimming pool and the gym operate 24 hours!

column4: Wonderful Room, Room, 2 Double Beds · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: Overall good experience, however the F&B staff was not friendly and attentive during breakfast.
It was great time to stay at W hotel. Swimmin pool and room was wonderful. But there is no shuttle bus from vivo city. So it was difficult to go.
location is great and the room is spacious. in-room dining food quality was disappointing, better to eat out.

Hotel breakfast is superb good. Shuttle service internal 15mins just outside hotel to bring you around in Sentosa. 1hr complimentary spa to enjoy hot bath, steam and sauna is nice too. Their welcome desk and engineer are really friendly and sincere, helped me to repair my broken sandal. Thank you very much for your hospitality, I highly recommend your hotel to my friends and family!
A great getaway if you are looking for a resort vibe kind of staycation

column4: Wonderful Room (King Bed) · 2 Adult(s), 1 child(ren) · 2 Nights
column5: excellence service, delicious breakfast, good to have 24hrs swimming pool but may not suitable for toddler as their water slide 122cm min height and no play ground but overall still nice to relax

Nice experience in w hotel , staff free upgrade us to a balcony room, room is very spacious with good view Breakfast got lots of choice and the swimming pool is big really feel like in oversea , gym is big and fully equipped
Had a good stay and excellent experience with the hotel staff. Staff will share all the information automatically even we didn't approach any from them
Superb view from the suites. Spoiled with choices for food down at quay side isle. Will definitely come back again.
Love their suites. Hotel staff are really helpful and friendly. Had a wonderful time.

This is my second trip. Excellent staycation . Gorgeous room and view . Staff was friendly and professional. We requested for birthday decoration they did it well and complementary cake . Very peaceful and enjoyable experience. Thanks

Lovely hotel with a big and nice pool. Love the room with beautiful lightings, and the spacious bathroom. The only disappointment was that I did not get the balloons and poster decorations as promised by their WInsider staff. As for the complimentary cake which was also promised, I had to call concierge to ask for it to be sent up. Other than that, all’s well I would say.

column4: Room, 1 King Bed (Away King, Guest Room, Plunge Pool) · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: Hi, Thanks W and their staff for their understanding. I greatly appreciate their efforts and help they provided me in regards of booking error. I would like to extend my gratitude towards all reception team and as well Klook team to bring my issue to a happy ending. Nevertheless, we are visiting w hotel on 3rd again and sure we will be having fun .
Love everything in this hotel. The mattress and pillow is not too hard nor too soft, the room lighting is very romantic, the bath tub is big enough, the pool is great.

Fantastic staycation. Extended stay and stayed a total of 4days at W Hotel Sentosa. Staff was friendly and professional. Excellent pool and food at Skirt as well as Kitchen Table. Highly recommended and would return.

column4: Spectacular Room, Room, 1 King Bed, Harbor View · 2 Adult(s), 1 child(ren) · 2 Nights
column5: Excellent staycay. The pool is big and the slide is perfect for kids. Room is spacious and clean. Service is great too. Staff is ever so helpful and accommodating. Perfect staycay to feel relax, refresh and rejuvenate ourselves.
the room was clean. no shuttle services provided to vivo. got to take sentosa bus. got bitten by mosquitoes while walking to the pool area. the slide was fun. the food was not great.
Enjoyed my stay here, loved the hotel and will definitely come back again.

Overall had a great experience. Loved the pool that has a slide and certain areas with mini jacuzzi functions. We took public transport there (by train from vivocity to beach station then take bus B) and went back via BlueSG as the station is a walkable distance away from the hotel. I would recommend this hotel if you like to have a staycation in a quiet environment. Staff service was good too!

column4: Room, 1 King Bed (Away King, Guest Room, Plunge Pool) · 3 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: 24hrs pool was amazing and the staffs were all really friendly
Good with good with good
The hotel was clean and the service by the staff was good, the location was also good as there was free shuttle service between Beach Station and the hotel

column4: Room, 1 King Bed (Away King, Guest Room, Plunge Pool) · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: The staffs working there were very friendly and kind. They are able to attend the questions and complaints from me very quickly. Cleanliness is excellent . Atmosphere is good and there are variety of facilities for me and my gf to enjoy. Recommended to have a staycay with your love ones here!!

The staffs working there were very friendly and kind. They are able to attend the question and complaint very quickly. The cleanliness is excellent. There are a good atmosphere and variety of facilities for me and my gf to enjoy. Manage to take a lot of nice photos in the hotel itself too
Superb hotel for staycay. Nice vibes and friendly staff
We had a great time and enjoyed the WET pool and water slide.

column4: Spectacular Room, Room, 1 King Bed, Harbor View · 2 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: Everything wasn’t working in the room, TV was down, USB port and charging port isn’t working too. Went down and called the concierge but they told us that someone would come up to help us settle. However, we waited for 1hr plus to no avail. Called the concierge again, and was informed that TV would be down the entire night. We requested for a room change, request was agreed to, however, the new room’s bedsheet has got dried blood stains.
Loved the room and swimming pool. Can’t vacay so stayca. Good choice!
Had the best time here as a titanium member - AWAY SPA masseuses (Atiqah and yeni) were amazing
absolutely amazing hotel. super clean and comfortable with friendly staff. perfect location on Sentosa. I cant wait to be back
Seamless check in and staff was ever so attentive. Overall process with covid guidelines were well abided at the hotel premises to give guests a peace of mind.
Nice hotel and staffs are very friendly. We reached early and they already for us to check in.
Really friendly hotel staff and great service! Overall wonderful experience especially with the thoughtful birthday arrangement!
Loved the whole vibe of the hotel, the spacious pool, the array of breakfast selection and the easy access to beaches of Sentosa!
Very awesome stay at W! Would definitely be back if klook has more awesome deals like this!
The hotel was great and the food was good. Will definitely come back to stay again.
Room is spacious and very clean. Staff is friendly and very responsive. Liked the overall feel and ambiance. Will visit again.
Spacious room! And def is coming back to this hotel!! We love the pool! Great for kids

Hotel facilities pretty much like any hotel… Swimming pool is a great for kids. Breakfast is good. Dinner is not up to expectations. Inform front desk that this stay is for my hubby birthday celebration, they said will do something but nothing was done, very disappointing.
Hotel room furnishing is dated needs to be refurbished. Dinner is not fantastic. It is abit over-priced. Overall experience is way below my expectations.

Maybe I was lucky, hotel was not packed, very peaceful and enjoyable experience. Staffs were very helpful and friendly. Liked the desserts the best in the 3 course dinner. Breakfast was great. Pool is so HUGE and beautiful. Too bad they were doing some minor renovation at one side of the pool during the day which is weird seeing maintenance guy getting into the pool with work clothes.
Nice place to rest and relax. enjoyed my anniversary there

Highly recommended hotel for a vacation since it’s away from the bustling cities making you feel like you are really overseas. Room is spacious and clean with a classy mirror and bathtub. Gymming comes with a fantastic view, and the pool comes with a mini slide. They even surprised us by offering us a complimentary mango slush while we were chilling at the pool. Overall, a great experience!
gorgeous rooms & views. great food and awesome service from the staff.
Definitely a chill and relax place for staycay, had their breakfast overall was good. Staff are friendly and assist you at your need.
Nice hotel with good customer service. One of the Top Hotel in the world
Love the location, quiet and peaceful. The pool is what I really like & the best part it open till late. The service is great too.
Great staycation. A little inconvenient if didn’t drive cuz the hotel is really far. Restaurants are just walking distance.
Enjoyable stay, nice clean rooms. Breakfast options was food.
Pleasant stay at W Singapore, hotel was quite crowded but service was great!
Amazing staycation experience. We've experienced the best hotel service in W hotel. Would come back again when schedule allows.

Good service and enjoy the 3 course dining at W Singapore. First time staying in this property managed to secure at an attractive rate with SRV and vouchers. Pool was big. Thou room isn’t at the best condition but all else 5 stars
The best hotel I have stayed in currently. Loved everything from the room stay to the 3 course dinner set 11/ 10 for the stay!

Had a relaxing staycation at W. Lovely environment, feels like I was on holiday. Staff was friendly especially the pool staff and the restaurant staff. Had dinner and breakfast at the kitchen table and both times the food was great! Staff Wai Meng and the rest were friendly and helpful. Had a wonderful time lazing by the beautiful pool and a relaxing walk around the marina, truly relaxing!

column4: Wonderful Room, Room, 2 Double Beds · 3 Adult(s), 1 child(ren) · 2 Nights
column5: We booked the Wonderful room. Room spacious and it came with a king bed. Very comfortable. Personally, I really enjoyed the tea selection in the room’s minibar. Most hotels provide only 1-2 selections of tea. This hotel gave us 5 selections of tea. As someone who enjoys tea throughout the day…. This was a fantastic perk for me. The location of our room had faced the condo infront but had a city view and sea view too. We also face a roof structure and when it rained, the noise was too loud. Perhaps for light sleepers, should check with front desk when they assign u the room. We spent 2 nights. Mostly spend the days at the hotel by the great pool. The pool came with an awesome slide! Woke up early one morning for a leisurely walk before breakfast. It was really relaxing.Spent some time at the luge. Breakfast was good. Nice selection of food. Food quality was generally good. Staff was very attentive and friendly. I loved the crab cakes egg Benedict. The dimsum basket was so so, especially the Har Gao. Think that can be improved.
Cleanliness was in tip-top conditions. Staff were friendly and helpful making our stay there a great experience!
The room was pleasant and dine in room service was really nice.
enjoyed the staycation with my family. the hotel gave us a cake to celebrate birthday. the food served at the restaurant of the hotel is really good as well. enjoyed time at the swimming pool too!
overall was good. place was nice and clean.great place.. not easy to get food but can always grab.. nice outside view.
nice hotel but raining so couldnt get to use the pool much :(
Room is nice with pool view. My children enjoy the pool slide very much.

I booked 2 nights for this package, but the hotel didn't give us SGD75 F&B Dining Credit per night. I think the package description wasn't indicated clearly on that. However, the hotel was great, all staff are helpful and kids friendly. Food selection wasn't fantastic but I guess it was good enough for light lunch/snacks.
Excellent ! Superb stay, nice environment and clean room, most importantly good service and nice location!
Lovely service at the kitchen table restaurant staff, nice pool slide. The room and service was so so, not as good as shangrila orchard or capella

W hotel is definitely one of my favourites since Starwood hotel chain time, for its unique morden design, simplified but still luxury. I always love the paint and sculptures in the hotel, to enjoy the cut edge fine arts with revolutionary thinkings. If you are looking for some unique travel or staycation experiences, Why not a W Hotel !
Outstanding atmosphere with wonderful view. Staff were friendly and approachable. And also, great service such twilight turndown. Kudos W Cove, will see you again ????
Very nice experience, staffs are patience, we requested for birthday decoration and they did it well!

wonderful stay! loved everything! just that the 3 course dinner set is better to top up to have more variety to choose from portion was huge me and hubs couldnt finish after we topped up to other dishes which was quite worthwhile but too huge portion for us as we are not big eaters hahahahaha loved the nice pool scenery and wide selection of breakfast items too!!!! would definitely visit here again ??
The room is warm and the whole environment is quite peaceful.
Second time @ W. Nice pool Food is nice View is nice Great room service too

Very clean and nice hotel in Sentosa. The pool was very big with a slide. The staffs were very friendly and helpful. My family of four had a great time spending our staycation with a spacious room and the hotel was very kind to decorate our room as it was my 20th Wedding Anniversary. Thank you John, the hotel customer service staff for his help on the wavier of my kid’s breakfast.

Food is great. Breakfast and dinner are fantastic. But the interior of the room is not that well maintain eg the shower door not able to close fully, the bathroom shower head leaking and the spoiled sink drainage. But all and all the service was excellent and we are offered a complimentary cake for our anniversary, which is vvv nice. The bed and pillow is also one of the better as compared to the other hotels. And my wife enjoyed the bath tub a lot.
Great experience and overall very pleasant stay with the hotel.
Great stay. Enjoyed the food within the deal. Pool was fantastic and could stay longer than allocated time.

Hotel is clean and service is good but only thing this hotel have this turn down service that we didnt know. My wife cant sleep and we have to checkout in the middle of the night.What a sad staycation and we are celebrate our annivasary there...
The early check in, in room treats and balloons decoration, daily ice cream treats are part of experience journey deeply appreciated by entire family!
nice and comfortable environment. love to stay in. the food is great as well. one think i dislike will be the distant from hotel to Sentosa. shuttle bus need 30min to reach
Nice and comfortable hotel with relaxing atmosphere. Smooth check in. Would love to stay again !!

Good experience as it felt that we were overseas due to the minimal people/crowd at that area. A pity as we were unable to dine in together, had to split 2 by 2 due to the restrictions. Food at Kitchen Table was ok, not amazing. Breakfast also could be better for a 5 Star hotel. Room was big and bathtub was huge. Bed was comfy as well. Pool and gym were great, but sadly the weather wasn’t the best.
It was great experience and would like to visit an another time
I have been here twice. One of the best hotel in sentosa, you wont regret it

Modern hotel with a big pool. It’s located at one far end of Sentosa. But complimentary public sentosa bus stops right in front of the hotel which can bring you to USS/Resort World in 15mins. Hotel provides complimentary chocolate cake with balloons during birthday. Idyllic stay with a resort feeling despite it been in June school holidays as place feels empty during Covid restrictions (no dine in allowed during June).
Enjoyable stay, always prefer w hotel for staycations. pool nice, room clean.

The check in process is seamless, we get to choose our preferred breakfast timing where there's a time limit for each slot. Their pool is available 24h, you can access anytime with your room card. There is complimentary parking, remember to take your coupon at the reception before you travel out. They are so sweet, knowing that our stay is for our honeymoon, they decorated our room with helium & "LOVE" balloons, and sent us a delicious cake ?. I like that there is a pillow menu to choose the type of pillow you prefer, just call them and they'll bring it over. They have various lightings for different moods, I like the one that will constantly change like rainbow colours ?? The window at the bathtub allows us to watch the TV while soaking in the bathtub. There is a speaker in the bathroom, connected to the radio in the TV, you can adjust the volume and dance with the music while in the shower ??. Our Dinner & Breakfast is done at The Kitchen Table. For dinner, the Wok Fried Hor Fun with Grilled Waygu Beef has a very strong wok-hey taste, the gravy is different from usual as its thicker and loaded with black pepper. The Wok Fried Hokkien Mee could be better. The nearest convenient store closes at 8pm so we drove to the nearby 7-Eleven to grab a cup noodle & lava egg for supper, this combination is so good ?. The breakfast menu is similar to St. Regis as they are from the same group, but we prefer the menu & food at St Regis. Check out is easy, just drop your room card in the basket and they will email to you the charges. Thank you for decorating the room.
Everything was great! The breakfast selection were plenty and the dinner was delicious! Loved the pool, the room and the bathtub!
Beautiful views from w hotel and room is clean with bathtub.
great rooms with 2 double beds and beautiful swimming pool with slides for thr children.
Great customer service, and the food was aplenty. Really liked the environment at Sentosa Cove too!

Had a wonderful time at W Sentosa. It truly feels like a getaway because of its exclusive location at sentosa cove. The pool was the main attraction. It's quite rare to see such a big hotel pool in SG. The room and toilet was very spacious as well.
Awesome Klook and W Hotel staffs who helped us create a special weekend for us!
Lovely place and excellent service! A good place to recharge
We went during covid period where gym cannot be used. Kinda boring there.

The room was great, service staff were friendly and food was fantastic! Definitely will be back and I have already recommended this to many of my friends! Check in was swift and check out was fuss-free too!
Clean and friendly staff. And I got an upgrade for my wedding anniversary.
good service and best place for couples or friends to just chill
Nice view, friendly staff, would definitely stay here again..

Awesome Customer Service 100%. Food Was Yummylicious. Room Was So Beautiful. When For A Staycation For My Husband Birthday. Room Was Prepared With A Balloon, Birthday Card And Cake Too. My Husband And I Love The Whole Stay. The View From Our Room Was So Nice. Swimming Pool Was Splendid. Best Place To Have StayCation With Your Love Ones. Once Again Thank You.
Super friendly staff, hotel room was spacious and clean. Only bad thing is no smart TV to watch netflix.
W hotel a best hotel to have your staycay at. Will definitely book again. The only regret I have is that I only book for 1 night. ????????????????????
great fun, we could get rooms side by side. food was fantastic too

Big room. Clean and bright decorations. Gym machines looks new and well maintained. Staff at The Kitchen were all very pleasant and cheery. Special mention of staff Wai Meng for her excellent service.
The staycation in Wonderful Room was amazing. The room is spacious and nice. The hotel staff service is superb. Would definitely stay in this hotel again. Thumbs up.
My 2nd staycation but this time due to the higher occupancy rate, the service was not as prompt as when I went in May. Nonetheless it was a great time. Love W!
super helpful staff and the room was really big and cute with a bathtub
we didnt do much at the hotel as we are not able to book the swimming timeslots tat we wanted. but the hotel was nice enough to send my son a b'day cake plus balloons.
Fantastic hotel and the staff were all super nice! Did a 1-night stay for my wife as it was her birthday! Will recommend this to all family and friends!
Enjoyed our staycation immensely, was not crowded thanks to Covid, great service and a well maintained room. Would highly recommend it.
Great experience for my hubby birthday staycation. Staffs were helpful. Breakfast was delicious. Room is really spacious and clean and comfy. Birthday cake is provided for my hubby birthday.
2nd time staying in this hotel. Very pleasant stay experience staff are all very warm and friendly.

Not my first W hotel, but first time stay in Singapore. Some area can be better like the room, it's a bit old, and some staffs at the welcome desk try to avoid the eye contact when I approached, so not W standard. Concierge talents are great, restaurant staffs are super friendly! Overall a great experience will definitely come back again!
Very relax staycation however more customer experience could have been better if hotel staff can reach out more

Room was nice and the food was good. However it gets noisy when it starts to rain. Sounded like raindrop hitting against a metal and it wad quite loud, thus disturbing sleep in the middle of the night. Hope that something can be done about that.
The room is clean, the food is good, the staffs are very nice and friendly. Smokers: the designated smoking area is at level 2 (outside).
Wonderful experience for family with young kids. The crew really knew how to make the stay special for the little ones!
It was a great stay! Hotel with helpful staff. Room was also clean and comfortable.
Good food and pool, relaxing environment. Water slide was quite interesting and enjoyed time there. Went for short walk around sentosa cove area at night.
Appreciate the extra effort by the staffs for helping up the decorations of my wedding proposal together with my supplier. My wife and I had a very romantic and memorable night during the stay.

It was a staycation to celebrate my wife birthday. The service was good, with lots of nearby eateries. After our dinner, we went to nearby convenient stall to purchase some titbit for a movie night the kids enjoy their stay for a night. We sent for a swim and the pool is clean. We will be back if there is promo from klook.
The view of the pool was magical and the food from Skirt amazing.

Great staycation with the family. Children can’t wait to go back again . Comfortable room and a great pool for kids to play non-stop. Breakfast selection was good as well. Staffs are helpful and friendly . Thank you to front desk staff, Marcus for the pleasant check-in experience .

I would give it 6 stars. Amazing hotel with great service. This is my 6th staycation at it beats Shangri-La, Fullerton or Sofitel hotel Sentosa by mile. I would suggest to stay 3 nights for the ultimate staycation experience

My family had a wonderful staycation at W Hotel. Checking in was fast. Room was clean. Views are good. Gym is well equipped and pool was amazing. Breakfast was delicious. Staff were friendly and helpful. Overall all very enjoyable stay.
Had a wonderful time during my stay! The service was outstanding!
Good food and nice place to stay away from the city! Enjoyed the day just relaxing ??
Perfect stay. Certainly one of the best for the kids.

Great accommodation and service. Even though we have to postpone our stay last min. Everything was handled perfectly. Our daughter had so much fun in the pool and at the bathtub. She loved it??????! And we loved it??????. Excellent??????????

Very kind and generous hotel, they offer sufficient bottles of drinking water in the room. Stunning mood lightings in the room. Was given a room at 7th Floor (Top flr) with nice view of Yacht docks. Take a nice evening walk by the bay to Cold Storage open till 10pm / 7-Eleven open 24 hrs, its nice!
Trust me is worth it the pool is self is 24 hrs 7pm till next morning 7am no need to make reservations at all the suites are fantastic!
Not the first time staying at W hotel. Lovely, clean and beautify hotel to be away from the city.
Room was abit dated and service was average. Items were missing from the breakfast sets we ordered.

Booked a room a month ago for a birthday celebration + staycation for one night. Checking in process was seamless and the staff attending to me was excellent (unfortunately forgot to take note of his name). The room was decorated with the birthday balloons and cake (the cake was delicious btw!), with compliments form the W management. Therefore, thank you very much for accommodating to my request and making our stay a great one. Anyway, management might want to consider the following to amplify the experience as a whole - installation of bidet in the toilet and Netflix. That's just what i think. :)
Room was really nice, and the breakfast tasted good as well. Enjoyed my stay
Just chilling during this covid period. Great staff and service! The ambience was great. Will come again!
Pleasant stay. Staff were very friendly and accomadating. Will be back again.

It was a pleasant experience and the staff were very friendly. There was some misunderstanding with regards to the room and the staff handled the situation very well. Truly appreciate the cheese platter and wine bottle given for the special occasion.
The Wonderful Room was spacious and romantic for couples~ highly recommended dining at The Kitchen Table. staffs are friendly and it was a pleasant stay for us :)
Wonderful experience spend time with family. The room is big enough for family. I would come back again
Absolutely love my experience at W singapore always. The package was really love which included breakfast and meal credits, worth the buy. Also there’s SRV to minus off total still. :)
We’ve our anniversary staycation at W Singapore, a pleasant welcome to the room:)

Very wonderful stay with one of the best rooms and view. The pool is huge and comes with a slide. Floats are available for purchase if you like. (Big duckies, unicorns etc) The room was spacious, sufficient for a simple workout. The gym is clean and well equipped. Wok fry hor fun from the kitchen table was yummy, so was the satay with chopped pickles and the butter chicken. The portion size is generous so best to let the server recommend. Special thanks to Kieron from the front desk and Wai Meng from the Kitchen Table for taking care of us and making my birthday staycation a memorable one! ??
Beautiful pool, nice jacuzzi and well trained, helpful and professional staff. Very nice getaway
Room is quite spacious but I feel not worth the price There r better rooms in other hotels at a better rate
Hotel is a little old, but overall still a good resort style getaway. Food served was quite a disappointment....
my 2nd night here. was very good just stay in room to cool.
I didn't spend time using their facilities but walking passed it and the conditional in the gym was fantastic. also, the pool was nice
Very good experience. Will definitely come back again

Highly recommend this place. Check-in & check out was seamless. Amazing swimming pool where the kids have great fun at the slide. The ambience of the room and the yacht view was fabulous. The room was spacious. The morning breakfast served to us was excellent. Signature crab pizza was delicious. A request for a small birthday cake were surprised with W hotel balloons too. If u join as member, the kid <12 years old, will get an ice cream too. Great treat for the kid. Thank you for the wonderful getaway…:)
Fantastic view fantastic room. We enjoyed our stay here very much.
I will come again :) the room was lovely , the staff gave us commentary macaroons and cake for the birthday celebration .

Amazing experience, friendly staff and very nice pool my toddler loved it. Thank you so much. Used our Singapore Rediscover voucher totally worth it. Will come back again. Smooth transaction with Klook.
Beautiful atmosphere, very friendly staffs. love it!
pleasant stay .. clean room .. well equipped gym .. and nice pool .. many restaurants nearby too
Nice and clean room .. what amazed me is the Bose speaker up at ceiling ... prefect sound system. Gym and pool are well equipped...
I am still waiting to hear back refund amount as W Hotel has already made the refund to Klook. But there’s no follow up from Klook. Can someone please respond to me ASAP?

Our favourite staycation so far - service and facilities were impeccable and we loved how it felt like an actual break. Check in was smooth and it was extremely easy to book our slots for breakfast/the pool.

I have prepared a birthday surprise for my boyfriend over here. He is very happy. Thank you to the hotel staff who helped me with the surprise. The service that the staff provide is fantastic, the food is delicious, and the most important thing is the room is very comfortable. We're glad to have good memories here and will come back again
Nice hotel with good service. Enjoyed our staycation very much and love the quiet and peaceful moments. Loved the walk along the broad walk and took many nice pictures.
Spacious room with excellent amenities including gym and swimming pool. Hassle free check in and check out process. Great place for a family staycation.
Awesome and Great STAY @ The Wonderful Room ???? Loved the pool very much and the whole hotel scented with a pleasant smell. Highly recommended and will stay again ??

column4: Wonderful Room, Room, 2 Double Beds · 2 Adults · 2 Nights
column5: Great experience with W Singapore Sentosa Cove. Very convenient & the hotel team are very attentive.
Clean, tidy, spacious, friendly staff, smooth check-in, knowledgeable. It is a good experience staying with them again and would recommend to stay again in the future.
Overall experience was good except being charged for 1 night parking at the hotel.
very good environment?good service and breakfast very nice, staff very kind and helpful.
My family had a very enjoyable time at W Hotel, will definitely return for more!
My family had a great time at W Hotel, will definitely come back again!
Nice hotel and they have prepared a nice cake for my birthday stay.

We enjoyed our staycation very much. Service was top notch and the pool wasn't crowded at all! Love the in-room dining and the breakfast at the balcony too! We got a room upgrade and an early check in! They surprised us with a cake and room decorations for our anniversary too! Really chill and romantic experience, even though our baby was with us!
Enjoy the stay with friend for a birthday celebration, staff was friendly and quick check in and out. Slightly inaccessible but shuffle bus is available
value was definitely worth it though the food there was bleh and inconsistent from menu.
Goooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!
staff polite . but dislike dining in the room not comfortable and no additional chair provided.

We booked the Wonderful Room as that was the only room time on klook but decided to top up for the Fabulous room at check in. No regrets getting the top up as the balcony had a full view of pool plus marina area. Hotel room is clean and the bed was comfortable. It was a nice gesture for the staff to decorate the room with balloons and a complimentary cake. In addition, service was great as they sent staff to go door to door to top up amenities in the room and we saved the hassle of calling to get additional water/soap. There is also a stretch of restaurants near the hotel for a wider dining option. Overall a great experience and highly recommended!

Fun trip with a wonderful experience at the spa, enjoyed the swimming at the pool during the day and a night swim. Love the lights around the pool. The service was good, staff at the entrance helped us to take photo with the W sign and with prompt additional requests by dialing “0”.

Although just one night stay but it’s very pleasant. Their swimming pool is clean and huge. Same for hotel room, have a very good view of marina especially at night time. Very near to restaurants that sell nice food. Will definitely revisit again. Oh their service is very good. Requested to change out my breakfast coffee for another drink and it came within 30 minutes.
Super pretty place and great service. Highly recommend
Enjoyable stay, hotel was clean and luxurious, at the pool there was free service to pump my large unicorn float. Will go back there again for another staycation.
Awesome place for a staycay! Will definitely come back again!

hotel is good. the team even help to prepare balloon and cake for my friend's birthday. really appreciate it. but I'll not recommend to dine at SKIRT restaurant. the service is really not hotel standard, and the price is not cheap.

In the room where there got very nice different colours of lights, the environment and atmosphere is very pretty! The swimming pools are very child-friendly, senior-friendly and adult-friendly as well!

We went for our staycay during the phase 2 heightening alert . Dine out are prohibited. Our mood was already dampen . We request for a free upgrade to the room with pool view but was rejected . Hotel could have manage this better . With limited access to facilities gym and no dining out , the hotel could have done better by giving more dine in credits or free upgreat of rooms. Other hotels provide freebies or free upgrade . The amount we paid was the same non phase 2 period but the experience was not the same .

No response from Klook and have to go ahead with the staycation despite the COVID 19 restriction announced on 13 May 2021. Pleasant staycation with good service from W hotel. Disappointed with Klook service
Best decision ever to stay in W. Room was amazing and they provide 4 different types of pillows! Will definitely go back again
Room is excellent easy access & usage of the pool very pleasant stay
Top tier rooms and exceptional quality service :) Called reception for 2 bottles of complimentary water bottle to my room, was being offered 10 instead. Arrived almost instantly. ??
It was an enjoyable 1-night stay with amazing pillows of varying firmness! Food and service at the Kitchen Table were also really good. Would definitely recommend to friends and strangers (:

I love the amazing artworks all over the hotel and overall service was also excellent. We arrived early and was pleasantly surprised with an early check in. I requested for an hour extension for check out and it was also extended to me. Very grateful. The hotel is clean and lovely, the location is amazing and exclusive. I don’t like the hand sculpture in my room, it’s too scary and I don’t dare to go to the toilet in the middle of the night because of it. I didn’t like the pillows because they were too soft and I only found out about the pillow menu on check out day. We used our dining voucher that came with the package for lunch at the kitchen table. The crab pizza can do with more crab meat, we can hardly find any. The wagyu burger was disappointing...not much seasoning and the patty was dry. However, breakfast was nice, especially the laksa! Overall, I love my stay, hopefully to do another staycay with my family again.

Beautiful room and amazing service from all staff at W hotel! W hotel is also located at Sentosa Cove area with restaurants and cafes nearby. The marina right in front of the hotel makes you feel as if you’re overseas!
an amazing room with a modern vibe far away from the city. makes it feel like we are out of the country.
pool is good and staff provided good service. relaxing.

The pool is amazing and really great for the kids because in addition to the main pool there is a decent size paddling pool which is really shallow so provides a lot of safety for the younger ones. My main issue was with the room. It does not compare to the one in Hong Kong and it looks dated and quite tacky. However, the room was a decent size and it also had a nice view. Service in the restaurant and bar could be improved. Food running out during the breakfast service and some mixers such as tomato juice not being available. Overall not a bad place but it’s not cheap so would expect much better for this price.
Will definitely be back again! One of my fav hotels in SG!

W hotel was wonderful. The post-booking support from Klook was disappointing. I wished Klook had put in effort to help me with an unforeseen problem that I encountered post-booking. They merely quoted the merchant’s terms and conditions. Did not even link me up with the hotel. To other customers who may require flexibility with the worsening covid19 situation, please note that this package is non transferrable or cancellable. Consider booking or liaising directly with the hotel instead of a third party like Klook.

Very clean hotel. But do note Wonderful room is the one that face the road, not even the pool view.I thought of getting sea view. I managed to top up for a better room as I want a balcony. They give bottle water every where. Love the sound system in the room. TV choices can be improved. Breakfast is okie but the paid buffet dinner can be improved. crab not fresh and small. Wanton noodle can skip. their cakes are nice thou.
Thank you for the birthday and anniversary surprises, W Hotel! We really enjoyed our 2 nights staycation. Excellent service and hotel ambiance! We love this hotel and would definitely come back!

What a beautiful resort!!! Perfect staycation to celebrate our birthdays, Mother’s Day and wedding anniversary. Luxury hotel means luxury service and ambiance. The whole family enjoyed our stay!!! Would definitely come back.
A good experience in W, with good service and quality room. But the color of the room, personally, cannot accept.

this time we opt for marvelous experience and is indeed marvelous ! Early check in at 12, late check out at 3, comes with breakfast for 2... and I have jacuzzi tub in the room! And .... I found a new liking- the egg chair !!! The bedsheet is so comfortable on the super comfy bed.. the bathroom is so well equipped with 3 types of bathing method.. I love their davines shower collection that smells so nice .. and couple with JDV mirror and hairdryer... totally like! Always love the quietness of the surroundings at W and the way how their rooms are so creatively lit up. All their stuff has interesting names too!

W Singapore has been the hotel of our choice over the longest time ever since the first time my wife stayed there in 2015 at their Marvellous Suite. Food quality has been the factor that most hotels would overlook but not for our stay at W Singapore. The food is consistently of the highest and freshest quality, whether it's their buffet breakfast, ala-carte lunch or dinner options. The experience is constantly a WOW for my family and I. Thank you W Singapore for the experience every single time we visit and we definitely will head back again.

Stay was average, the fact that it didn’t feel like a 5 star experience despite the inflated price. The downfall was the customer service, I paid extra $180+ for upgrade to accommodate the third person in the room, but was not given late check out. There were several times housekeeping staff entered the room when we did not answer to their knocking and ringing. The receptionist girl was so unfriendly and unapproachable.
Friendly staff service, clean room, fast service and respond. Comfortable stay.
Very nice staff! Had an amazing stay at W Hotel. The room was clean and really cosy.
clean n big room....no gym , reserve to go pool n resturant. staff are helpful. overall experience v good. will visit again if room has good discounts.

We are so glad to have this weekend getaway to explore the east side of Sentosa. The hotel is so nice to help us celebrate our wedding anniversary with nice decorations and complimentary cake. The pool is the highlight to my stay. Though we were given late checkout, the 2D1N passed so fast before us. We had the package with 3-course dinner and all-you-can-eat breakfast but nothing is especially impressive.
Easy to book and make amendments to my booking of the use of swimming pool, gym, spa, breakfast and etc. Not much crowd so it was a quiet and pleasant stay. Good service as well:)
Good amenities and service. Ambience is nice too. Food is great as well.

Well I bought a voucher package (2D1N stay with afternoon tea and breakfast) on 9 May 2021. I would expect that I will be able to enjoy the afternoon tea on 9 May itself. But NOPE. It was fully booked and it wasnt indicated on the voucher that I have to make a reservation. Do the hotel really expect people to stay on 9 May and enjoy the afternoon tea on other days? What a disaster to celebrate Mother Day for my mother. I suggested to exchange the afternoon tea for dining credit but the staff has to check. (20minutes has passed while writing this review but still no update. Yes I have high expectaction) To be fair, the staff did offer to let me checkout later on 10 May to enjoy the afternoon tea but I have other schedules planned and it cannot be rescheduled. Hope this review can remind people to book their whatever tea or spa that is in the package in advance to avoid disappointment. Giving a 1 star because I am extremely unhappy and the fact that I paid extra money for the afternoon tea but did not get enjoy it. I will just treat it as ????.

???????????????with elite member upgrade,we manage to get a away room in the away spa . Breakfast and dinner already included ?I use the 75 dollar food credit for dinner with 20 % elite member discount, very worth it . Sea bass and w signature chill crab pizza is very good ??

I was celebrating a birthday during this staycation and W did up a simple balloon decor and a tiny chocolate cake which was delicious! Thanks to the team at W! We had an amazing stay. Highly recommend this place to families with kids.

We had $75 credit at Kitchen Table, the chef was very generous to give us a big pizza although we only ordered a kids pizza. However, was quite disappointed with the food there. They have a very big swimming pool and we enjoyed very much for the 2hrs booking slot.

great service and clean hotel. experience is great, except there is somethng to watch out about the use of food voucher, we r not aware or not inforned it cannot be used for room service, hence end up paid more...

Fantastic staycation. We got an upgrade to a bigger room with living area and long balcony. Pool was amazing, even though there were quite a lot of people. The food at The Kitchen Table was only average, so avoid it for dinner and go to Skirt or the many restaurants just outside the hotel.
Good nice view... Good service staff Nice swimming pool and gym. spa facilities was also very gd

Staff didn't seem as friendly as pre-covid days, or it could be that we booked using a voucher instead of directly from W website. A lot of new and inexperienced staff in the pool area and check-in, but there were also older staff who were quite to do service recovery. Pleasant stay. Quite crowded. One has to book breakfast and pool visits the day before.

I checked out of W hotel this morning and I have deducted 3 stars from my review because of 3 incidents. At check in I was told that I would have to pay more because I requested twin bed. I was shocked as extra fee was not mentioned when I booked the hotel room without breakfast. I was flustered and opened klook app to look for details of my booking. I didn't want to share a king size bed with my sister. The staff quickly went into a room and promptly came out to announce that her supervisor had waived the fee. I feel that W Hotel is not honest in its advertisment - "twin bed upon request" means customer can asks for a twin bed instead of king size bed, extra fee should have been specified. In current time of Covid where many people are suffering from mental stress, a staycation should be a pleasant experience. In the evening, I discovered a patch of stain that could be dried blood on my duvet and I quickly rang housekeeping to change it. The next morning at breakfast, I ordered al la cart instead of buffet because I wanted a light breakfast. I picked W Hotel signature french toast and I was taken aback when I saw what's on the nice red plate. It was just One slice of thick toast sprinkled with some cream, tiny blueberries and small slices of strawberries. Perhaps I was served an al la cart buffet portion for $22 before GST. It was not air flown from Paris but made in-house. The 2 stars I gave are for the nice hotel ambience and pool experience as well as for the service by the male staff on the ground floor manning the Trace Together and temperature checks and the concierge.
booked second night without breakfast included. as the breakfast offers a good spread of choices, it is recommended to book with breakfast included. The spa facilities is nice.

Good size hotel room. Spacious bath area. Very clean. Good gesture to decorate room with balloons and provide Birthday cake. Breakfast has good spread of choices. the beds is overused, It is sunken in the centre and not comfortable to sleep on.
Great service and pool. Kids love the pool and slide. Nice that they hv double beds for family of 4. Beds are a tad too soft.
Amazing experience. Fantastic room and we even got a birthday cake. Thank you team W

Visited on Labour Day weekend. Smooth check-in process. Lots of families but I suppose it is due to the weekend. For some reason, Skirt is fully booked for the Sat evening I checked in. You will need to reserve a spot to use the pool between 9am and 7pm. Each slot is 2 hours. Outside of these hours, you can use the pool any time. If you are visiting the beach, you can also get a pass which gives you free entry to the beaches along Sentosa.
Excellent service provided by all the staff.Thanks for the great experience W Hotel.??????

Extremely unpleasant experience upon check that completely destroyed our holiday mood. Booked on klook which gave the option of choosing a king sized bed or 2 beds (and we even called beforehand to ensure we would get 2 beds and they agreed). However, upon check-in the staff (an Indian man who claimed to be a manager) refused to give us 2 double beds and even insisted we pay 60 dollars extra even though there was only 2 people staying in the room. This was extremely unreasonable and unprofessional since 60 dollars was an extra person charge. Very disappointed with the poor service of a supposedly 6 star hotel. They also agreed on 3pm late checkout in the call but during check-in he said 1pm was the latest checkout?!!
The hotel is worth the ratings, their lobby is so cozy and even the rooms, the bed is so comfortable. Really glad that I have chose this hotel for my staycation. Will definitely come back again !!
A great getaway from work. Wonderful facilities such as gym, swimming pool, sauna, jacuzzi, steam room etc. Breakfast was great too, lots of selection.
Nice hotel. The room is spacious with a nice view. Breakfast selection (ala-carte buffet due to covid restriction) is good with a wide variety to choose from.

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at W Hotel Sentosa - location was very peaceful; staff were very efficient and quick to address any concerns and inform on new social distancing procedures (booking of slots for swimming pool access and breakfast buffet); room was very spacious for 2 persons and generally clean although we did find a cutip under the bed; food at The Kitchen Table was part of the package and was really amazing as well.
Good and enjoyable experience, with nice breakfast. Variety for dinner selection and quality of meals can be improved.

We arrived at W Singapore and did a pre-check-in at 9.30am. We had a great time exploring Sentosa on our bicycles while waiting for our room to be ready. A bummer was we did not receive the mobile notification informing that our room was ready for check-in earlier. We had booked a one night stay to celebrate our wedding anniversary and were pleasantly surprised to see the 'LOVE' balloons welcoming us when we checked in. Our Wonderful Room was clean and comfortable with the added luxury of a nice relaxing bath-tub. We included the 3 course dinner and 'All You Can Eat' awesome breakfast in our room package. The crew at The Kitchen Table was attentive and polite. We had to top up between $5 to $20 per dish from our dinner set menu. We enjoyed the quality good food but the W Burger patty was quite dry, Satay, Crispy Squid and Wagyu Hor Fun was tasty. We very much appreciated a 2 hour late check-out and went home happy & rejuvenated from our short stay cay at W Sentosa with their Express Check-out service! Thank you W Singapore !

Great service. Wonderful pool. The food in the hotel is delicious. Had the chilli crab. The crab wasn't cracked so had to ask for it to be cracked. It was finger licking good. Lovely room. Spacious and clean. Breakfast was nice. Hanafi served us. He recommended the smoothie which was good. Hanafi was friendly, helpful and prompt in his serving. Great experience. Will definitely come back again.
Love the hospitality! Pros: Facilities are well accessible. Cons: Quality of breakfast at The Kitchen Table could be better

Booking through Klook and using the SDV is a breeze. Was able to check in at 1pm. Check in was very fast and we were issued our room key within 10min. The room was very clean and cosy. Only mineral water is free (many bottles provided). All other things are chargeable. The surrounding area is very beautiful, with the boats at the Marina, many hip restaurants, clean water in the cove teeming with fishes and jelly fish. We even saw a big wild turtle in the cove. The restaurant at Quayside Isle are all reasonably priced. Hosted some friends there. The only setback is the hot weather and lack of sea breeze even late into the evening.

We had a great stay! The pool was by far the best we’ve ever experienced. So big, the water temperature was great. I liked the ala carte buffet breakfast because the selection was more exciting than a standard continental breakfast, which included local delights and “millennial food” like avo smash and granola yoghurt nut muesli mixes. I loved the gym; fully stocked with the best brand. Had a challenging workout when I set the machines to exercise programmes. If I had to pick out something I didn’t like, I’ll have to say that upkeep was not 10/10. Maybe 8-9/10. It didn’t have a sparkling clean feel, and the carpets did feel like they needed a bit of a refresher. But really no harm done because I’m just nitpicking. The other thing, which is much harder to change, is the decor of the place. Wasn’t my thing; the flowery decor and flowers in jars. It was an aesthetic I couldn’t really appreciate. The flowers at the edges of the mirrors in the bathroom creeped me out because they looked like flaking parts of the mirror or like unclean residue. Maybe it’s just me. But all in all, fantastic stay! Other than nitpicking, nothing to complain about.

We had a good and relaxing time at W Sentosa. We had the wonderful twin room and it was nice and spacious. I had been to other W hotel outside Singapore and the W Sentosa did not disappointed. It maintain same high standard in quality and luxury ambience. Highly recommended for a staycation there.

Amazing experience and great value for money! Loved the decor of the room, and the service was top notch. Pool was amazing and not too crowded. Breakfast was decent - dim sum could have been improved. Overall great stay and out-of-SG feels!
Stay and ambience is one of the best I had. Only downfall was the showers did not have hot water and the air con control was faulty for my room.

My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here! From the spacious room (the bathtub has a view of the TV), to the pool (complete with fun slide), to the jacuzzi/sauna/steam room area (what a pleasant surprise!) to the amazing breakfast. Service was great throughout. Highly recommended and will definitely return if given the chance to!
Room is big and spacious, bathtub is fabulous, all accessories are good quality, fridge is also cold unlike most other hotels where fridge is only at chilling temperature.
environment is clean and quiet. service is excellent food is great

We enjoyed our stay at W Singapore so much!!! The hospitality was good as the front desk has responded to my email timely and arranged for my special request which is so lovely to me. Room was very comfy, facilities all good, hair dryer is better than my home one ^^ Swimming pool is exactly as best as described, great time for family bonding & photogenic one! No doubt a five star well deserve for W Singapore! Claps!

Love this hotel so much! Service was great and the staff provided us a complimentary cake and some decorations in the room for our anniversary celebration. Dined at the Kitchen Bar and it was great. Will definitely be back again!

Great amenities and services by the W team to make sure my special occasion turn out well. Highly recommended for people looking to find a staycation in a fun and well decorated hotel room. The dessert was great but the mains in the 3-course set dinner was so-so.
Very good deal on Klook in an impressive hotel. Will be back
wonderful experience. nice pool, beautiful room and services was excellent. food is good as well. love it and will visit again
What I wonderful hotel, will visit one more time. Big family swimmming pools
Extremely friendly and helpful staff and beautiful location.views were great, Room was very clean and bed was very comfortable. Delightful stay

Had a pretty good impression of W Singapore via a friend’s experience but apparently it differs from actual experience. I booked a room with twin bed but during check in, the staff insisted that he can only provide us a king bed. I explained to him that when I booked it was because of the twin bed selection. He argued that I have to pay an extra $60 for the twin bed. Only after I showed the Klook voucher that show the selection for twin he decided to provide us the room that we actually booked. Wasn’t exactly friendly, looks like he was pretty annoyed. Facilities and room is ok, the toilet floor will be all wet after bath despite closing the shower door.

Had a pleasant stay at W hotel to celebrate my fiancé’s birthday. Hotel room was pretty and clean with a very comfortable bed and bathtub! Would have preferred for the room to be more well-lit (room still feels dark when the curtains are drawn). Service provided by hotel staff was excellent although they missed out in bringing us the birthday cake which I have requested before the trip.

The room was clean and spacious. It was my sister’s birthday, and we were pleased with the surprise cake and balloons prepared by W hotel. Breakfast was such a spread, we love the mee siam and avocado toast!! Will definitely be back :)

Great experience. Good room service and nice ambience Excellent property and very convenient to Sentosa. Front desk staff is extremely efficient, pleasant and helpful. Property is clean and has a fantastic old time charm.

Very good stay at W Sentosa Cove. The staff at Breakfast at The Kitchen Table was very friendly and polite. Service is good. Check in/out also fast and easy. Gym, spa, pool are nice, clean and not crowded. Pity that it was raining when I was there. Overall is very good.

Service was excellent except for this lady we encountered when we went for our free breakfast at The Kitchen Table. She asked my husband for our room number but he wasn’t paying notice and didn’t answer her. She looked up at him and frowned and was very curt throughout. Otherwise, I would definitely come back. It was an amazing experience.

Traveling to Sentosa isn't really that hard because there are shuttle bus within the Sentosa island after arriving from Vivo City via train. W Sentosa is actually located at eastern side of island away from RWS. Its kind of great if you don't want alot of human traffic. Hotel itself has great facilities like pool, gym, bars and restaurants. After a nice dinner, a stroll along the wharf area really reminds me alot of overseas. Hotel room has some excellent control on the lightnings, whether you want a more warm or sexy setting. Bathroom can actually be open fully, so you can literally jump from bed into the tub. Lastly, W Singapore is actually part of Marriot group, so remember to use your membership.
Had a wonderful stay at the W celebrating a birthday. Great and friendly service!

Pros 1.This is our second staycation as my husband really likes the pool which is nice n big. I like the spa which has the wet and hot sauna and 2 whirlpools. 2.Booking of facilities for safe distancing is easy and we managed to swim twice. 3. Hotel went extra mile to provide birthday cake n balloons since I stayed on my birthday Cons 1.We ate at kitchen table. While food was suberb, there was long waiting time even though restaurant was not crowded. 2.Since the menu are all digital, I hope management can consider adding pictures so we know the portion and exactly what we getting for breakfast buffet. In the end we over ordered and there was too much food wastage. The staff could hav advised on the portion too
Great room and amenities. Wonderful service by all staff. The pool and the bar are perfect for lounging all day/night.

Had a great stay at W with my parents. The staffs were friendly in helping us to check in/out and throughout the stay. The services were great but a little inconvenient to get in and out of the hotel.

From the moment we arrived, up to the day we left - we were Wowed! Swift check-in and express check-out! Indeed, I had a fabulous birthday at W! Spacious Suite and so love the jacuzzi bathtub! Comfy bed that put me to sleep in no time. Gym & Pool reservation is well organised. Enjoyed our breakfast (no long Qs).Had a wonderful dinner at Skirt. If you needed a total recharge, The AwaySpa is a must! Thanks to Rose for that relaxing massage. Enjoyed the Spa facilities too.
We had a nice stay. Hotel stuff has made the perfect birthday arrangement and was able to place my gifts inside the room before I arrive. Wonderful!
Great service and very enjoyable experience. Thanks for the decorations for our anniv. Nice big pool with slide. Alacarte buffet breakfast was good too.

Friendly hotel staff from entrance to reception, good connection to Sentosa attractions via 15 minute interval shuttle buses. Wonderful breakfast options with prompt service and great outdoor seating.

Very satisfied!! I adore the hospitality. The staff are polite and very helpful. We supposed to get early check in at 12pm, but the room wasn't ready. So we were given a standard room for resting. Once the room ready, keycard was sent to the resting room. And we supposed to get late check out at 3pm, but we were welcome to stay until 6pm ???? Thank you very much W hotel. You can get beach pass at concierge, free to go to any beaches, no need to book online. Free unlimited ice cream for kid (just show the bracelet) on the evening start in 4pm We are muslim, the kitchen table is not halal, but they provide our request like uncut fuits and cereal, very respectful and not judging.
Booked M suite. Great experience. Room is huge, great for couple to stay.
Room was very clean and well appointed. Guest service was excellent. Breakfast was excellent. Would definitely recommend.
Service Level at the hotel was very personable. The staff served with a passion.
Fuss free check in, 24/7 pool access and spacious room

Service was impeccable. We left a message before checkin that we were celebrating our daughter’s birthday and were greeted with balloons and a cake in the room. The pool was not overcrowded and it actually felt like a vacation without having to travel out of the country. The bedding was so comfortable we had such a good rest. Really enjoyed our stay at W.
Great staycation, the free breakfast and 75 dollars dining credits at the Dining Table is definitely worth it! Thoroughly enjoyed myself
Absolutely relaxing. Great pool. Good food. Nice happy hour. Spacious room. An escape from daily rut. Sit sip swim repeat

We had a luxurious & enjoyable staycation at W. We booked the suite, and it was so spacious and comfortable. Facilities at W were great, and we got to enjoy the gym, pool and spa facilities. All facilities requires booking of time slots. The gym/spa was almost empty and we had the whole space to ourselves. Service from the staff was awesome. We had a great mini getaway, and would highly recommend W!
One of the nicest pool in Sentosa and we if you plan to upgrade your room, email them in adv as the rates are higher at the door.

column4: Wonderful Room, Room, 2 Double Beds · 2 Adult(s), 2 child(ren) · 1 Nights
column5: Check in and out was a breezed. a very pleasent and rnjoyable stay will not heditate yo come back. highly recommendable.
Good stay, with a great outdoor pool. Limited movie channels available though.

Lovely hotel with excellent service, the check-in process is a breeze! The staff are professional, offering prompt and friendly service. The rooms are spacious and clean, classy-looking and comfortable. Food is yummy too, highly recommend!

The Wonderful Room was clean and the hotel staff generously gave a sizeable cake for my husband’s birthday! We loved the dinner at Skirt, realllllly superb and top-notch! ?? The ala-carte buffet breakfast at The Kitchen Table is pretty good as well - $70 dining credit was utilised for lunch here, the horfun has alot of wok hei and is a must-try!
it was a awesome staycation. the hotel was spacious and clean. big swimming pool and beautiful interior throughout the hotel.

Great one night stay over the long weekend. We had asked for an early check in and was given the room around 1230pm :) The breakfast has a nice categorisation and was fantastic! Managed to booked the pool twice across both days, and the family thoroughly enjoyed the experience.

No cakes were provided for birthday celebration which they had promised. Breakfast was decent with late timing till 11.30am. Swimming pool, breakfast place and room were installed with awesome speaker as the music complements the relaxing surrounding, which makes the difference.

very nice room with generous amenities and without doubt fantastic views. service of staff is friendly but does not respond quickly. For example our in room dining came 20mins later than scheduled time and also it took more than an hour for them to collect the dishes back. Buffet svc also seems to be understaffed. overall, still a wonderful stay but W could do better.
Good experience, went during Valentine’s Day the staff even provide us cake

Stayed for a night in a Wonderful room that also happened to have a little harbour and sea view despite being partially island facing. Room was clean. Balloons and cake were provided by the hotel for a celebration and this was very well received. Pool slot was an ample 2 hours per day, and was not too crowded. Breakfast was decent and service standards overall were pretty good for my stay. Great experience with a resort feel.

loved the experience here. great service, great food, great room, great facilities and short bus ride to the beach which is great too when it's not too crowded. would definitely come again if I can. thank you to the team for giving us a great honeymoon.

The rooms were good. However, the $75 dining voucher were pretty difficult to use especially when the check in time is at 3pm and the check out at 12pm, and breakfast time slot given to us was 10am. So we had to use it during lunch as we had dinner plans for the night before.
Get the pool view. Beautiful. The room is slightly old tho.

My friends and I stayed for 2 nights. There's a bus that stops at the entrance of the hotel as it is quite a distance from the main attractions/activities. The room was clean and spacious, the staffs were fast and efficient too! Will definitely return for another staycay.
very nice staff at the Front Desk and the breakfast staff at the cafe. the stay was wonderful, the kids enjoyed their time at the swimming pool.

Checking in and out for this staycation at W Singapore is a breeze. Efficient service and housekeeping staff responds quickly to requests. The Marvelous suite we stayed in is comfortable for 3 people, with its very spacious bathroom and what’s more, it has a jacuzzi bath tub. There’s also a powder room in the suite, which is great when there’s more than 2 people staying there. Breakfast at kitchen table restaurant is below expectations though. That’s why I rate as good and not excellent. Overall, it is a wonderful staycay!
Wonderful experience at W sentosa cove. 2nd time here. Hassle free purchase and room rate is value for money.
Hotel and room was ok. Easy booking for using of swimming pool, 2 hours per slot. Nice place to walk outside of the hotel.
Fantastic!! Hotel is really special and unlike any other staycations in Singapore. 24hours pool, free jacuzzi and sauna, round trip around Sentosa Island, and more!
staffs was all very courteous and warming. everything is good just that wasnt given a seaview room. also, saw from other review that birthday cake was given but there wasnt any for us.
We really had a wonderful time staying at W singapore! One of the best staycation in singapore and will definitely come back again. Thank you W singapore for the great service!!

column4: Wonderful Room, Room, 2 Double Beds · 4 Adults · 1 Nights
column5: Had a nice stay at W hotel with the family. The view from.the room was nice, saff are friendly and helpful and the pool is open 24/7, great for a night swim.

Honestly highly recommend!! Great room, great service, great view!!! Really feels like you are on a holiday someplace else instead of in Singapore. The room was super big and the bathroom was as well! Bathtub was super clean too. Would definitely come back here and stay for longer, if only for the vibes.
Top notch hotel with beautiful deco and impressive services! Definitely worth the stay!

Great family staycation with the kids during school holiday. Thank you for the special decoration of the room with balloons for our anniversary. Hotel is at the quiet side of sentosa with many restaurants n cafes nearby. Highly recommended.
super good super fun , and the service makes the price worth it
nice luxury experience.. i hv pay to upgrade to marvellous suite the room is spacious and bathtub comes with jacuzzi function.. once a while to pamper yourself
Great holiday chill out. Good location with lotsa restaurants and amenities in the surrounding area. Room was great and pool with slide was fun for kiddos.

great experience! a hotel tucked in the corner of sentosa away from the usual crowd, yet theres a nice selection of restaurants next to the hotel. enjoyed the spa/pool. felt that breakfast can be improved. the food was lukewarm when served and did not taste good. definitely not worth it for 48++ per pax.
Nice rooms, great pool and good service. The food is surprisingly tasty and much cheaper than the restaurants outside W hotel. Highly recommend it.
Most relaxing time for staycations due to isolated area~ many selection of breakfast lunch and dinner at W and nearby restaurant. Would love to go again.

The Hotel Staff was not as passionate as others, we went to enjoy the pools and had dinner at the Kitchen Table. Dinner was awful as the 3 course Dinner was served late, and not up to Standard. Breakfast was good though. It's one of the bright spot. We didn't get to enjoy much on our first staycation.
Perfect staycation, impeccable service and well maintained hotel??
Fantastic stay at W hotel. Great staycation option although breakfast was a little disappointing. Overall was still a great stay with high comfort level.

A wonderful room in a wonderful hotel indeed. Impeccable customer service, clean and comfy room; we had an exceptional stay at W. They even surprised us with a cake and balloons in the room as it was my partner's birthday! Will definitely recommend W to our family and friends.

2nd time stay here. It’s quite isolated to the main attractions of the Sentosa. If you like quiet, you will love it. The good improvement is there’s free shuttle bus to the beach area comparing 5 years ago. Overall, the staycation is chilled. It’s worth to stay here.
nice, comfortable and cool hotel. will definitely stay again.

column4: Marvelous Room, Room, 1 King Bed · 2 Adults · 2 Nights
column5: Good place to stay. far from the city and nice view of the sea. great recommend. will come again

Hospitality at its best! The hotel was clean, modern/stylish and staff was friendly, and it is very conveniently located at Quayside Isle, where there are lots of great food within walking distance. The hotel also arranged a birthday cake for my husband - amazing! The only comment I have is that I didn't fancy the texture of the toiletries too much (on the oily, shea butter side) - but it might be my personal preference.

The service is fantastic at W. They are ever so accommodating and sincere as well. W was so kind so as to allow early check-in. Booking for the gym and pool were fuss free. Breakfast was fantastic as well. Only wish the dinner at Kitchen Table was of better quality given the steep price tag.
Wonderful stay, room was spacious and clean. Only thing we didn’t quite like was that the lights were a bit dim. Nice quiet place away from the main part of sentosa, good for couples.

Spacious Room, good service at the Kitchen Table restaurant. at breakfast the basket of breads/pastries & cold n American breakfast was fine but not the local dishes like fried carrot cake, mee Siam, fried kway teow which were poorly cooked & came cold! On the whole enjoyed the staycation.though spoilt by the most important meal of the day!

Totally loved and enjoyed our stay with W Hotel. The generous amount of toiletries gave this hotel the 5 full stars rating. Housekeeping was really “ninja”. Came back from a swim and was pleasantly welcomed with a neat and tidy room again! Breakfast buffet was splendid. Due to this Covid, it was served alacarte style; the presentation was similar to the ones we would usually have in cafe. Would definitely revisit for a staycay again!

Checked into the marvelous suite just past 12nn, the process was quick and managed to reserve slots for the pool and breakfast at the same time. Room is spacious, though the view can be better if not for the condo opposite the hotel which is kind of blocking the sea view. There are also obvious wear and tear of the furniture, which I feel the Housekeeping should have noticed and rectified. Had hi-tea at Woobar, Abi from Woobar was very helpful in reserving a slot for us on the same day even though we didn't book in advance. Her service was excellent and was always wearing a smile while serving us. I have to say that service wise, W is high on my list as compared to some other local hotels I hv stayed in.

Have a great stay over at W Singapore. Check in and Check out was very smooth. Staff is friendly and helpful. The pool is amazing. The only downside was that the extra bed that I'd requested came in very late. Need to remind them again and it's only set up around 8pm++.

The marvelous suite was clean and beautiful, with a view overlooking the Marina. Staff were courteous and knowledgeable. We ordered in room dining from Skirt and the steaks were delicious. Early check in and late check out was another plus point
Great for families, the rooms are spacious L, staff is very attentive and the pool has enough space to stay comfortably with kids.

Everything is so great about this hotel. Room was great and cosy. The smell throughout the whole hotel including the room was nice. Staffs from ground and restaurants were friendly. Wide selections of items during breakfast and they are good. Only complaint is the rain shower kept dripped water when i was using the shower head. Overall great. I will be back.
Nice and comfy room with a big pool. Will be happy to be back.

Wonderful experience with awesome yacht berth and sea view. Hotel's Service level 5 stars definitely. Pool, gym and spa activities Well organized and planned with little to no waiting and queuing despite complying to every detailed safety measures. Will not recommend anyone to stay because I'm too afraid it becomes too popular that it would run out of rooms during my next visit!??

Check in was fuss free but no over promise on early check in. When we were checking out the next day, saw quite a number of people checking in early. Good to try. Room amenities was ok but some fittings seem old and about to fall off. Good pool experience and it’s 24 hours. Bookings have to be made during the day. Food was ok and nice bar to chill

Great Room, love the location and surrounding. Very great service and attentive. They set up the room for our anniversary, knowing that we have kids it was very thoughtful that that they place toddler toiletries which i did not expect. On top of the great deal with Rediscovery deal, the food at The Kitchen Table was awesome. We love their Asian and western food, the breakfast spread ala carte buffet, small portion and we get to enjoy almost all the items. Love the folks at The Kitchen table for being so interactive with guests to make the whole conversation more homely than expected
Amazing experience! Good service and courteous staff. Picturesque views!!! Good breakfast options. Quayside, just a step away.
excellent experience! will be back to enjoy more of their facilities!
Stayed at the Marcelous Suite for a night. Balcony has a really comfortable cabana and the sliding door is really sound proof too. Pool is fantastic as well.
room category was the lowest tier one and had to pay to upgrade. no balcony but still acceptable

Had a fun staycay although the place right at the end of Sentosa. Overall had a pleasant stay. Celebrated our anniversary here, room was decorated nicely and cake was given. Thank you W for making our stay a pleasant one!
Spacious and clean room with great amenities within the hotel. Friendly staffs and quick check out provided.
Very cozy room with different modes of lighting to choose from for the occassion, was offered a room with a nice view as well and truly enjoyed the stay at W Hotel Sentosa Cove.
Check-in was seamless. Room is neat and clean. Truly enjoyed our staycation.

Booked 2 nites, overall a very fabulous experience in a nice and quiet environment and would definitely book again for staycation. Free single exit parking coupon available at reception. Wet pool is opened 24/7, for now, need to reserve pool are at 2 hours block during check-in (or any other times) from 9am to 7pm. Other times are free to go as long as its within safe distancing. No towels available outside the booked hours as "pool counter" is closed. There's a Jason "mini" supermarket within 2mins walk at Quayside Isle for some snacks and drinks.

The check-in process is very smooth and easy. Staffs were friendly from front office to housekeeping to Kitchen Table staffs. Room is spacious, comfy and clean. Booked the room with the $75 dining credit, however, this caused a big confusion during check-out as the front counter staff was unsure of process and the whole process took almost 45mins to complete. Kitchen table food is nice but on a salty and sweet side. Weirdly for the hotel standard, the female staffs all had their hair loosely untied and this is a first i see in a F&B environment. Carpark door is closed after 10pm and need to walk to car from hotel entrance to the carpark main entrance instead. Overall a very fabulous experience in a nice and quiet environment and would definitely book again for staycation.

Me and my husband enjoyed our 2 nights stay in W's Marvelous Suite. Checking in was fast. We were given a corner room on level 3. The room was really spacious and clean. The bed was comfy and big enough even for 4 pax ?? The hotel prepared some balloons and a really delicious chocolate cake delivered to our room with compliments to celebrate my Husband's birthday (Thank you!) Breakfast was good, service was fast and staffs were all friendly and attentive. Will definitely return to stay.

Friendly staff i stay in the wonderful room package, bed was soft and comfortable, room is clean. Ample water, counted there was 6 bottles of water in the room and 2 in the bathroom. managed to check in at 2pm plus, at around 5pm, the hotel staff came and check if there is anything need to top up. love this gesture. Pool is big and warm and its 24hrs Gym was well equipped. with the $75 dining credits is well enough for dinner. breakfast has good choices. nice as well. enjoy this stay and my wife would want to come back. bed is very very nice.
Great ! Nice pool, TQ for preparing Cake & setting in our room for our Wedding Anniversary! It was a surprise !

The room was quite spacious and we loved the view from the room. Staff were very nice, polite and our stay at W Singapore was so pleasant and smooth. Highly recommended and will definitely book a staycation again here!!
Enjoyed the stay. Rooms were clean. Kitchen table restaurant serve nice food.
Fantastic stay - staffs were very polite, attentive and helpful. Good breakfast and dinner at the Kitchen Table. Will definitely stay here again next time.
A fantastic staycation. Clean hotel, pleasant staff and a good breakfast.
Good experience, room was great big swimming pool, free parking

I had a room with twin beds. The room is big enough to accommodate 4 adults. The swimming pool is awesome and the gym is fantastic! My family and i totally enjoyed ourselves for our 1 day staycation. We got to use the swimming pool twice during our stay!
The room was splendid. We had an enjoyable stay. Service staffs were friendly very welcoming. Defo another visit

Very enjoyable stay at W hotel. Staffs are all very friendly. Food is nice. Bread and their butter is awesome. Free bfast buffet is in quite a large portion each so can’t really try many different kinds. Nevertheless food is awesome
Great service, nice food and great weather. Thanks W Hotel...

It was a fantastic staycation at W Sentosa. We upgraded our room from Marvelous Suite to Away Suite room for celebrating our baby's birthday. The room was amazing, spacious with living room and private plunge pool. W team sent us some welcome fruits, W NY Cake, 5 balloons Complimentary (We ordered another 10 ballons) and birthday poster. The cake was really good! The bathroom also good, because the bathub was so big. The minus only at breakfast, we had to wait for a long time just to enjoy a singapore laksa, seasonal fruits and croisant that we already ordered before. 40 minutes not come, so we decided to leave the resto without enjoy the breakfast (btw, the resto for breakfast was not crowded).
Excellent hotel, great service and a nice location for our weekend staycation. Lot's of things to do in sentosa. Highly recommended

The food was meh at best, even when you use the vouchers provided. Hotel was abit old already (the hot water at the jacuzzi pool was not working so was very cold) but the facilities were not bad. The bathrobe was the best thing at the hotel but unfortunately they were being sold at $200 a piece.

Booked for 2D1N staycay with frens, we had 2 rooms and W had kindly arranged both rooms to be nearby to each other. Package included breakfast and afternoon tea, food is normal but experience is good. Room is spacious, love the facilities like the gym and indoor/outdoor pool and enjoy the stay. Will recommend to others.
Great value for a 5 star hotel. The service was amazing and the experience was memorable!
Great deal, comes with breakfast and high tea package
The atmosphere, all the people staying at the hotel are polite, the facilities are clean, and the staff are very friendly.
The hotel was quite gorgeous and bubbly, and I enjoyed the extraordinary atmosphere.
Even in Sentosa, it was a quiet and nice atmosphere because it was a hotel in a residential area.
The facilities are the latest luxury and very good, but there is a problem with operation.
A variety of delicious breakfasts, a designer hotel for young couples.
Facilities are enriched with gym, spa and pool. The room is also very luxurious.
Good atmosphere! Enjoy a relaxing mood.
The pool was not too crowded and I enjoyed it as if it were a private pool.
This was a hotel where people could relax without being trashed.
It feels like a vacation because you can spend time away from the city. And the interior is cool..
Beautiful lobby, room, pool. It was great to relax at the pool bar.
The pool was huge, my daughter was very happy, and the breakfast was very varied and delicious.
I think it is a good location and hotel grade to get a more tropical feel in Singapore.
